entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 March 2023
